title: Westcott 16761 Premium Hot Glue Gun Pen with 5-Ft Cord
description: The evolution of the glue gun is at hand with the new Westcott hot glue pen. Equipped with an easy-to-use trigger and an ergonomic design, this hot glue pen dispenses glue with precision every time. Simply pair it with mini glue sticks and start crafting. Westcott is dedicated to supporting and inspiring creative activities. Westcott products, including our premium hot glue pens, are specifically designed for completing crafts and created to be fun and functional. Designed to help you bring your ideas to life, our crafting tools feature superior quality and offer exceptional value.
